about_the_game: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character. Her Cool Summer Outfit allows her to stay cool while defending the Earth, no matter how intense the battle gets.
detailed_description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character. Her Cool Summer Outfit allows her to stay cool while defending the Earth, no matter how intense the battle gets.
